version_description:
We regularly update hum by Colgate app. For the best experience, download our latest update today.

This update includes the following enhancements, as well as bug fixes and improvements:
• Quickly and easily activate the Guided Brushing activity by powering on your toothbrush.
• Averages (on your profile tab): a fun way to view your brushing data.
• Daily points chart (on your profile tab): see how many points you earn in a day.
• More insights on your brushing summary screen.

Get humming! Have a question or issue? Contact us - we’re here to help.

We have partnered with obé Fitness - helping you sweat and smile more!
-Fitness Fridays - Access exclusive, weekly short form workout content
-30 day Free Trial - Redeem 100 Smile Points for a free 30-day trial to obé Fitness, unlocking thousands of live and on-demand classes.



This update also includes bug fixes and improvements.
